description: Creates a link to a specified external Git repository. A repository link allows Git sync to monitor and sync changes to files in a specified Git repository.

parameters.name: ConnectionArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connection to be associated with the repository link.

parameters.name: OwnerId
parameters.description: The owner ID for the repository associated with a specific sync configuration, such as the owner ID in GitHub.

parameters.name: RepositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository to be associated with the repository link.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags for the repository to be associated with the repository link. (dict) --- A tag is a key-value pair that is used to manage the resource. This tag is available for use by Amazon Web Services services that support tags. The tag's key. The tag's value.

nested_items.name: RepositoryLinkInfo
nested_items.description: The returned information about the created repository link.

nested_items.name: ConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connection associated with the repository link.

nested_items.name: EncryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the encryption key for the repository associated with the repository link.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The owner ID for the repository associated with the repository link, such as the owner ID in GitHub.

nested_items.name: ProviderType
nested_items.description: The provider type for the connection, such as GitHub, associated with the repository link.

nested_items.name: RepositoryLinkArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the repository link.

nested_items.name: RepositoryLinkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the repository link.

nested_items.name: RepositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the repository associated with the repository link.
